get a flextable from a xtable object

xtable_to_flextable.Rd

Get a flextable object from a xtable object.

xtable_to_flextable(x, text.properties = officer::fp_text(),
  format.args = getOption("xtable.format.args", NULL),
  rowname_col = "rowname",
  hline.after = getOption("xtable.hline.after", c(-1, 0, nrow(x))),
  NA.string = getOption("xtable.NA.string", ""),
  include.rownames = TRUE,
  rotate.colnames = getOption("xtable.rotate.colnames", FALSE))

Arguments

x

xtable object
text.properties

default text formatting properties
format.args

List of arguments for the formatC function. See argument format.args of print.xtable. Not yet implemented.
rowname_col

colname used for row names column
hline.after

see ?print.xtable.
NA.string

see ?print.xtable.
include.rownames

see ?print.xtable.
rotate.colnames

see ?print.xtable.

Examples

library(officer)
if( require("xtable") ){

  data(tli)
  tli.table <- xtable(tli[1:10, ])
  align(tli.table) <- rep("r", 6)
  align(tli.table) <- "|r|r|clr|r|"
  ft <- xtable_to_flextable(
    tli.table,
    rotate.colnames = TRUE,
    include.rownames = FALSE)
  ft <- height(ft, i = 1, part = "header", height = 1)
  ft

  
#> Error: <text>:16:0: unexpected end of input
#> 14: 
#> 15:   
#>    ^
  Grade3 <- c("A","B","B","A","B","C","C","D","A","B",
    "C","C","C","D","B","B","D","C","C","D")
  Grade6 <- c("A","A","A","B","B","B","B","B","C","C",
    "A","C","C","C","D","D","D","D","D","D")
  Cohort <- table(Grade3, Grade6)
  ft <- xtable_to_flextable(xtable(Cohort))
#> Error in xtable(Cohort): impossible de trouver la fonction "xtable"
  ft <- set_header_labels(ft, rowname = "Grade 3")
#> Error in inherits(x, "flextable"): objet 'ft' introuvable
  ft <- autofit(ft)
#> Error: objet 'ft' introuvable
  ft <- add_header(ft, A = "Grade 6")
#> Error in inherits(x, "flextable"): objet 'ft' introuvable
  ft <- merge_at(ft, i = 1, j = seq_len( ncol(Cohort) ) + 1,
    part = "header" )
#> Error in inherits(x, "flextable"): objet 'ft' introuvable
  ft <- bold(ft, j = 1, bold = TRUE, part = "body")
#> Error in bold(ft, j = 1, bold = TRUE, part = "body"): objet 'ft' introuvable
  ft <- height_all(ft, part = "header", height = .4)
#> Error in nrow_part(x, part): objet 'ft' introuvable
  ft
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): objet 'ft' introuvable

  temp.ts <- ts(cumsum(1 + round(rnorm(100), 0)),
    start = c(1954, 7), frequency = 12)
  xtable_to_flextable(x = xtable(temp.ts, digits = 0),
    NA.string = "-")
#> Error in xtable(temp.ts, digits = 0): impossible de trouver la fonction "xtable"
  
}

#> Error: <text>:1:1: '}' inattendu(e)
#> 1: }
#>     ^
